items.description: Oakington Brook and Beck Brook at Oakington and Westwick
items.message:
River levels are rising at the Oakington river gauge as a result of heavy rainfall.  Consequently, flooding of roads and farmland is possible today 14/09/2021.  

We expect flooding to affect Dry Drayton Road, The Broadway, Cambridge Road, Orchard Way, Longstanton Road, Mead View, The Drift, Lowbury Cresent, Water Lane, Kettles Close, Holme Close, Arcadia Gardens, Cherry Orchard and Station Road in Oakington and Oakington Road in Westwick   

Further light rainfall is forecast over the next 6 hours. We expect river levels to continue rising this afternoon.

Property owners with individual property resilience are advised to install it now.

We are closely monitoring the situation. Our incident response staff are checking defences and liaising with emergency services.  

Please avoid using low lying footpaths near local watercourses and avoid contact with flood water.  

This message will be updated this evening, 14/09/2021, or as the situation changes.
